module.name: compute
module.label: MCF 0.3 prototype
module.description: Molgenis compute framework that extends the molgenis protocol framework adding the computational details

entity.name: ComputeProtocol
entity.description:
Executable definitions of computational 'protocols' of analysis. For example: bwa-align. Therefore the Protocol class is extended:
script : Each operation is defined in a wrapping, that is, a parameterizable description of the computation in Freemarker or R (depends on interpeter). The parameters are defined via the features of the protocol.
interpreter : When this protocol is 'applied', the parameters are merged with the freemarker script to produce an executable analysis which is then interpreted by the chosen interpreter, currently in either bash, R or python.

field.name: scriptTemplate
field.description: Commandline or (template of) an script, e.g. in R. Templating engine is freemarker.

field.name: interpreter
field.description: the interpreter used to run this command. For example 'shellTemplate'

field.name: Inputs
field.label: Inputs
field.description: Shadows Protocol.Features (copy):The features that can be observed using this protocol. For example 'length' or 'rs123534' or 'probe123'. Also protocol parameters are considered observable features as they are important to the interpretation of the observed values.

field.name: Outputs
field.description: Shadows Protocol.Features (copy):The features that can be observed using this protocol. For example 'length' or 'rs123534' or 'probe123'. Also protocol parameters are considered observable features as they are important to the interpretation of the observed values.

entity.name: ComputeFeature
entity.description: Parameter are the inputs or outputs into an ComputeProtocol. It reuses all of ObservableFeature to define the type of the parameters. It extends ObserveableFeature with the marking whether the parameter is input, output or both.

field.name: iterateOver
field.description: Use this parameter to iterate over the values in this parameter. Only holds for 'range' and 'list' value types. TODO: support list/range types.

field.name: defaultValue
field.description: the value of the parameter for Jobs

entity.name: ComputeApplication
entity.description: A protocolApplication that reports the scheduling or application of running a ComputeProtocol. Discussion: how to tie this closer to the data?

field.name: StartTime
field.description: Datatime when the job was started.

field.name: protocol
field.description: Reference to the protocol this ProtocolApplication is an application of. Shadows ProtocolApplication.protocol.

field.name: PreviousSteps
field.description: To keep track of calculation dependencies == workflow; Note: can be changed at runtime

field.name: script
field.description: The actual command to be sent to the cluster, is a filled in version of the one define in the ComputeProtocol, depending on the interpreter (e.g. R gets values prepended, bash gets freemarker template applied

field.name: StatusCode
field.description: Status code of this subjob. Currently: 0: start, 1: submit, 2: error, 3: succes
